2070910.name: Catto Pew Pew! - 完整的内容
2070910.description:
Coolest Catto DLC

With the Coolest Catto DLC, you get access to extra maps, along with any new maps to be added in the future. The best part? Only one friend has to buy it! If the host owns the Coolest Catto DLC, everyone in the lobby can also access the new maps.

Feature list:

• 7 new maps on release, with more to come!'

• All community-made maps
• Any future content updates and game modes

Note from the developer:

Choosing to purchase the Coolest Catto DLC greatly helps me continue to work on the game and reinvest my free time into its development. Your support is appreciated!
2070910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
